input: Which one of the following statements about Money Bill is correct ?

options.A: A Bill shall be deemed to be a Money Bill only if it Provides for imposition of fines or penalties
options.B: A Money Bill shall be introduced in the Rajya Sabha
options.C: The Rajya Sabha can reject the Money Bill.
options.D: The Speaker of the Lok Sabha finally decides if it is a Money Bill, should any dispute about it arise
